casebody.data:
DE FOE, Appellant, v. BALTZ, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. December 8, 1893.) Action by Isaiah J. De Foe against Mary Baltz.

Argued before HARDIN, P. J., and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment reversed, and a new trial ordered, with costs to •abide the event. Held, the evidence presented a question of fact which •ought to have been submitted to the jury.
